Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293T cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced binding to Rab10 in GST pull-down assays for Y1699C.
Increased binding to Rab10 in GST pull-down assays for G2019S.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding activity < 30% or > 150% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: Co-immunoprecipitation was performed in HEK293T cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced co-immunoprecipitation of Rab10 with Y1699C LRRK2.
Enhanced co-immunoprecipitation of Rab10 with G2019S LRRK2.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Co-immunoprecipitation signal < 20% or > 120% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: Western blot was performed in HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced LRRK2 phosphorylation at S935 in Western blot for Y1699C.
Increased LRRK2 phosphorylation at S935 in Western blot for G2019S.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation level < 40% or > 130% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: Quantitative GST pull-down was performed in HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced binding to Rab10 in quantitative GST pull-down for Y1699C.
Increased binding to Rab10 in quantitative GST pull-down for G2019S.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding activity < 35% or > 140% compared to wild-type.
